review: The Fire TV Stick gives me an error message saying that my bandwidth is too low to avoid interruption (buffering) while playing.  However, I can watch the same things on my laptop with no interruption so I am very unsatisfied with my purchase.

review: I own this Amazon Fire TV Stick along with Roku 2. The Fire TV Stick is much faster and sleeker looking than Roku 2. Fire TV Stick requires very few reboots should it freeze up. The Roku 2 would intermittently reboot quite often without warning. Roku 2 has a bit more choices as for contents and apps.

review: Actually a lot better than I expected very impressed with fire stick, I went to target at first and bought the Roku stick they did not carry the fire stick, I was very disappointed with it, the roku would not hook up to my wireless, everything to do with it I had to go to the computer which was a pain I got frustrated took it back for a refund saw the firestick at bestbuy plus it was 10 dollars less than the roku, brought it home it took all of 3 minutes to hook up, almost everything you do straight on the tv, very simple, nice picture sound all in all excellent.
